name: Cazoo Group Ltd.
description: Cazoo Group Ltd. is a leading online car retailer based in the United Kingdom, revolutionizing the way consumers buy and sell used cars. Founded in 2018 by Alex Chesterman, Cazoo's mission is to make buying a used car as easy and convenient as buying any other product online. The company offers a wide selection of high-quality used vehicles, ensuring that every car is fully inspected, reconditioned, and comes with a comprehensive warranty. Customers can browse the inventory online, arrange for home delivery, and even return their purchases within a specified period if they are not satisfied. Cazoo has rapidly expanded its operations and services, leveraging technology to enhance the customer experience and streamline the vehicle purchasing process. In addition to selling cars, Cazoo also provides financing options, vehicle maintenance services, and a seamless online experience that empowers consumers to make informed choices. The company is positioned at the forefront of the evolving automotive retail landscape, aiming to eliminate the traditional hassles associated with buying a car. With a commitment to transparency and customer satisfaction, Cazoo is set to transform the automotive industry and promote a more efficient, customer-centric approach to car buying.

seo.meta_title: Cazoo Group Ltd. | Online Car Retailer in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Cazoo Group Ltd., the leading online car retailer in the UK, offering a seamless car buying experience with a wide selection of inspected used vehicles.

faq.question: What is Cazoo known for?
faq.answer: Cazoo is known for its online platform for buying and selling used cars in the UK.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cazoo?
faq.answer: Alex Chesterman is the CEO of Cazoo Group Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Cazoo headquartered?
faq.answer: Cazoo is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What services does Cazoo offer?
faq.answer: Cazoo offers a wide selection of used cars, financing options, warranties, and vehicle maintenance services.
